body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.62-2 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/71199 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+sjdnosdjn2o2s@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense. 4. Click Submit. 5. Go to Reports > Reports. 6. Go offline. 7. Click on the report. 8. Click Approve. 9. Click app back button. 10. Select the report via checkbox > click dropdown button. BUG: Delete option is still shown when the report is approved. 11. Click on the report. 12. Click Mark as paid. 13. Click app back button. 14. Select the report via checkbox > click dropdown button. BUG: Delete option is still shown when the report is paid. ## Expected Result: Delete option should be hidden when the report is approved or paid offline. ## Actual Result: Delete option is still present when the report is approved or paid offline. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/baf0eebc-b75b-44df-a344-c500185dd76d [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.62-2 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/71199 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sdjonijoijcoixcjnoicjoxi@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense without category (to have an expense with violation). 4. Go to Reports > Reports. 5. Go offline. 6. Select the report via checkbox. 7. Click dropdown button > Delete. 8. Delete the report. 9. Click Review button, or go to Inbox to access the deleted expense. 10. On mweb, Android or iOS, long press on the deleted report > Select. ## Expected Result: Bug 1: Review button and arrow button on the right should be disabled when the expense is deleted offline. Bug 2: The expense deleted on Reports should no longer be accessible anywhere. Bug 3: On mweb, Android and iOS, the report should not be selectable when deleted offline. ## Actual Result: Bug 1: Review button and arrow button on the right are still clickable when the expense is deleted offline. Bug 2: The expense deleted offline on Reports can still be accessed from Inbox. Bug 3: On mweb, Android and iOS, the report is still selectable when deleted offline. On web, the checkbox appears green without checkmark when report is deleted offline. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d0669f0c-a425-464a-99e3-5886f60c7510 https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/950adeb4-df99-4c6d-9a66-9c10d3f8a30b [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: Add Concierge / Admins room in the Right Hand Pane

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

body:
Problem
Users can’t access Concierge in the parts of the app where they need it most (e.g., Workspace Editor / onboarding flows). This breaks onboarding and makes support-driven setup tasks slow and error-prone. 

https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C090U774ZH7/p1763756176719899

Solution
Add Concierge as a first-class, right-hand-pane (RHP) experience across the product (“Concierge Anywhere”): auto-spawn Concierge in key areas (Workspace editor, Reports, etc.), allow context-specific assistance, and surface threaded conversations in the RHP so users can chat without leaving their current flow. Make Concierge the primary interaction in the RHP while preserving the main pane for the page users are working on.

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @shubham1206agra</details>

Go back to workspace chat 10. Right click on the report with one split > Delete 11. Delete the report 12. Click on the empty report ## Expected Result: The empty report will open ## Actual Result: Report loads infinitely after deleting split and opening the empty report ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop
